statements.insert: insert into IN_SALE_NOTICE_D(djbh, dj_sort, spid, sl, yzid) values(#djbh#, #dj_sort#, #spid#, #sl#, #yzid#)

insert.iterate:
insert all
into IN_SALE_NOTICE_D(djbh, dj_sort, spid, sl, sl_jh, yzid,thyy_sj,dj,je) values(#listItem[].djbh#, #listItem[].dj_sort#, #listItem[].spid#, #listItem[].sl#, #listItem[].sl_jh#, #listItem[].yzid#, #listItem[].thyy_sj#, #listItem[].dj#, #listItem[].je#)
select 1 from dual

statements.insert: insert into IN_SALE_NOTICE_D_HTY(djbh,dj_sort,spid,phid,js,sl,lss,sf_zx,dj,je,pch,djbh_sj,dj_sort_sj,yspd,thyy,ph,pzwh,rq_sc,yxqz,tptm,yj_sh,sf_sh,sf_dg,sf_js,thyy_j,hwzt,sf_sjsh,yzid,kb,kfbh,shjl,sf_fj,fjqk,fjjl,clyj,sf_fjsh,ccyskzsm,sf_shsh,sf_scjs,shsl,bz,rq_sh,ry_czy,container,ry_ysy1,ry_ysy2,ry_shy,js_jh,sl_jh,lss_jh,thyy_sj,shshsj,ysshsj,billfrom) select djbh,dj_sort,spid,phid,js,sl,lss,sf_zx,dj,je,pch,djbh_sj,dj_sort_sj,yspd,thyy,ph,pzwh,rq_sc,yxqz,tptm,yj_sh,sf_sh,sf_dg,sf_js,thyy_j,hwzt,sf_sjsh,yzid,kb,kfbh,shjl,sf_fj,fjqk,fjjl,clyj,sf_fjsh,ccyskzsm,sf_shsh,sf_scjs,shsl,bz,rq_sh,ry_czy,container,ry_ysy1,ry_ysy2,ry_shy,js_jh,sl_jh,lss_jh,thyy_sj,shshsj,ysshsj,1 from IN_SALE_NOTICE_D where djbh=#djbh#
